data.title: Mike Horyczun with Mike Horyczun on WPKN 89.5
data.meta_description: MIKE HORYCZUN hosts an evening drive radio program (4 p.m. to 7 p.m. EST)on the first Wednesday of the month on WPKN (89.5) FM in Bridgeport, CT.Folk, country, rock, funk, jazz, blues, bluegrass, and world music getthrown in the mix, with new and old favorites always on hand. Mike alsoenjoys having live in-studio performances and interviews. Expect to hearheavy doses of guitars and the contemporary singer-songwriter sounds.Besides doing radio, Mike writes about music for CT Hearst Media and has aweekly music column in The Norwalk Hour www.thehour.com. He also works inmedia relations. He’s an established singer-songwriter and has played hisoriginals at music capitals all over the country, including Nashville,Austin, TX, and New York City.Contact: Mike Horyczun, PO Box 55, West Henrietta, NY 14586
